pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, January 21, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet retreat.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual engagement with frontline workers to highlight the contributions of Tamil Canadians. Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand and Member of Parliament for Scarborough—Rouge Park Gary Anandasangaree will be in attendance.

Closed to media.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual celebration for Thai Pongal and Tamil Heritage Month in Canada. Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand and Member of Parliament for Scarborough—Rouge Park Gary Anandasangaree will also deliver remarks.

The virtual celebration will be livestreamed on Member of Parliament Gary Anandasangaree’s official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/garyforsrp
